about_the_game:
It's finally here! The OFFICIAL soundtrack to ROTT 2013 by Andrew Hulshult!
30 classic tracks created by Lee Jackson and Bobby Prince FULLY remastered.
COMPLETELY LUDICROUS.

  • 1 - Apogee Fanfare - 0:11
  • 2 - Shards - 3:20
